layer.name: Fellowship
layer.definition: Building relationships with friends who are on the journey with you; mutual investment, transparency, and sharpening. 'Two are better than one' (Ecclesiastes 4:9-12). 'Iron sharpens iron' (Proverbs 27:17).

questions.text: I have people I regularly pray with — not just for, but WITH, sharing burdens and interceding together.
I have relationships where we discuss Scripture, spiritual insights, and what God is teaching us — mutual learning.
I have people who know where I am spiritually — the real state, not just the public version.
I allow others to challenge my spiritual life and receive it as sharpening, not attack.
I invest in others' spiritual lives as much as they invest in mine — the relationship is mutual, not one-sided.
